Name: Shopkeeper Simulator VR
About the game: Shopkeeper Simulator VR is the only VR tycoon simulator that provides an economy system and where earning money actually matters! At the end of the day you must have enough money to pay the rent. Sell various items to your customers and reorder them. You can increase prices per item but customers will have a buy limit. Invest in equipment to speed up your tasks. Oh, and beware of thieves! Features 15 different groceries to buy and sell! Choose between endless mode delivering infinite fun or a 3-day-challenge to keep it short! Unlock equipment for better efficiency: Store products in your fridge to keep them fresh, get notified by a door bell when a customer enters the shop and stash your money in the safe! Prevent thieves from stealing your hard-earned money! Innovative VR controls: Use your eyes and fingers to operate the control center! Get support from the improved tooltip help system! Listen to great music and crazy sound effects! Please be aware that this game officially supports the original HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.
